description: Temple is an active baselayer designed for multisport use. It is lightweight, has a slim fit and is packed with features to deliver performance in all conditions. Temple uses Mons Royale's ultra-lite Merino Air-Con 140. Nature's climate control - It keeps you cool when you're hot, warm when its not.
name: Mons Royale Temple Merino Air-Con Tech LS - AOP - Mens
